passive.description: Gun holds up to 6 bullets. While not using skills: If at 0 bullets, reload instantly. Otherwise, reload 4s after skill use. Each bullet increases reload time by 0.5s. Cannot interrupt reload.

basicAttacks.description:
[Basic Attack]: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to the target. Every 4th Basic Attack becomes [Headshot]. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 112%] Physical Damage and always crits.

[Basic Attack]: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to the target. Can cast [Ricochet] every 6s. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage and applies 30% Slow for 4s. Bounces to 1 enemy behind the target up to 4 times.

[Basic Attack]: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to the target. Can cast [Armor Break] every 7s. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and reduces Armor by 10% for 4s to all enemies hit.

commonSkills.description:
Places a trap at the target location that lasts 150s. When enemies enter its range, reveals Stealth for 2s and grants a  
[Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 4s. Creates a slowing field, reducing enemy Speed by 35%. After 2s, explodes to deal 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players (
[Damage Rate: 270%] Physical Damage to mobs). Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 2 charges.
Steps 6m in the target direction. The next 4 Basic Attacks gain +80% Attack Speed and +25% damage for 6s. Loads 1 bullet. Gains 1 charge every 16s, up to 2 charges.

Throws a powerful grenade at the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and knocking enemies back 6m from the center. Reduces Attack Speed by 30% and Movement Speed by 40% for 4s. If within blast radius, the user is pushed back 6m.

Throws a flash grenade to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range, revealing Stealth, and giving Basic Attacks a 45% chance to miss for 6s.
Enters Aim mode. Increases Basic Attack Damage by 40% and range by 6m. Reduces Movement Speed by 65%. Use again to exit Aim mode.

skills.description:
Consumes 2 bullets to fire two shotgun blasts forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 110%] Physical Damage to players (
[Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges.

Channels for 6s (requires 1+ bullets). Consumes 1 bullet
per second, stopping at 0 bullets Fires a hail of bullets every 0.25s at enemies in a frontal cone, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage. Damage reduced to as low as 70% on enemies the further away they are.
Gains [Target-based Max HP 40%] Shield during channeling.
Cannot be interrupted and rotates slowly

Lock onto an enemy and channel for 3s. Consume 1 bullet every 0.5 while firing. Each bullet deals 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and reduces Armor by 10% for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit. Ends when out of bullets.

Uses 2 bullets to fire 2 Toxic Shroud grenades at the target location. Upon landing, creates 2 Toxic Mist fields, lasting 6s. Each field deals 
[Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every second to enemies in range and reduces Healing Received by 25% for 6s. Gains 1 charge every 12 seconds, up to 3 charges.

Consumes 1 bullet to fire a sniper round in the target direction. The first enemy hit takes 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage The skill can be charged. After charging for 2s, the sniper
round penetrates enemies along its path, dealing
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage
Damage is boosted by Basic Attack Damage and can crit
based on Basic Attack Crit Rate
Bullet range increases with charge time
Gains 1 charge every 6s, up to 6 charges

Scans enemies in front, locking onto 1 enemy every 0.3s, up to 6 (prioritizing unselected enemies). After scanning ends, fires energy projectiles at locked targets, consuming 1 Bullet per target. Each shot deals 
[Damage Rate: 175%] Magic Damage, reveals Stealth, and gives Basic Attacks a 40% chance to miss for 6s

Enter Deadshot mode. Cannot Move but can be canceled at any time. Basic Attack replacement: Use 1 Bullet, shooting towards the target direction. The Bullet deals 
[Damage Rate: 190%] Physical Damage to enemy targets along its path. Damage increases by 10% for each enemy hit, up to a maximum of 50%. Critical Hits deal 150% Critical Damage.

Activates Photon Activation for 20s. Immune to Slow and Immobilize. Gains [Prism Beam] and [Prism Camo]—[Photon Beam]—
Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage and drains 5 MP from enemies
After 3 beams, the next Basic Attack becomes an 
Enhanced Prism Beam: Consumes 1 bullet to deal
[Damage Rate: 135%] Physical Damage and drain 5 MP from enemies. Gains +25% Movement Speed for 3s
—[Photon Camouflagel—
Removes all control effects. Gain Stealth and +30% Movement Speed for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled
